author: John Binder, John Binder
title: Coronavirus Jailbreak: 14 Republican, Democrat Senators Ask DOJ to Free Elderly Felons
description: A coalition of 14 Republican and Democrat Senators is pleading with the Department of Justice (DOJ) to provide an early release to elderly felons in federal prison in the midst of the Chinese coronavirus crisis.
content:
A coalition of 14 Republican and Democrat Senators is pleading with the Department of Justice (DOJ) to provide an early release to elderly felons in federal prison in the midst of the Chinese coronavirus crisis.
